551.question: What tasks were evaluated?
551.response:
{
  "Answer": "The evaluated tasks are: Detection of an aspect in a review (Task 1), Prediction of the customer general satisfaction (Task 2), Prediction of the global trend of an aspect in a given review (Task 3), Prediction of whether the rating of a given aspect is above or under a given value (Task 4), Prediction of the exact rating of an aspect in a review (Task 5), Prediction of the list of all the positive/negative aspects mentioned in the review (Task 6), Comparison between aspects (Task 7), and Prediction of the strengths and weaknesses in a review (Task
551.answer: Detection of an aspect in a review, Prediction of the customer general satisfaction, Prediction of the global trend of an aspect in a given review, Prediction of whether the rating of a given aspect is above or under a given value, Prediction of the exact rating of an aspect in a review, Prediction of the list of all the positive/negative aspects mentioned in the review, Comparison between aspects, Prediction of the strengths and weaknesses in a review
